Maslow will not be proved wrong in the eyes of history the way that will will be if we do not adequately address the crises that face all of our people together.

@CDPHE You realize that the Governor faces a red wave, likely will not be re-elected, and all of your department “heros” that you are celebrating in this repulsive victory lap of malfeasance will be fired?

@CDPHE Oh good, you are taking responsibility for administering the vaccine and lockdowns and masking! This will work well for you in the trials coming your way!! Everyone of these people MUST BE HELD ACCOUNTABLE

@CDPHE You guys lied about the shot and used the word science when you really didn't exactly know. And now the side effects coming out people having problems with their liver which one doctor said that that would probably be the case two years after they got the shot!!!

@CDPHE Are you kidding I just saw the video of Rochelle walinski stating how they were hoping the shot would work not really basing that on science but kept using that word. And then the science direct said ivermectin is associated with decreased mortality and covid-19 people!!!
